disclaimerText: This forecast is intended to provide information on expected pollution levels in areas of significant public exposure. It may not apply in very specific locations close to unusually strong or short-lived local sources of pollution.

currentForecast.forecastSummary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Saturday 12 March to end of Saturday 12 March GMT
currentForecast.forecastText: Saturday is expected to be dry with sunny outbreaks.<br/><br/>The air flow is set to become more south westerly with 'cleaner' incoming air from the Atlantic.  With adequate wind activity for dispersal of local emmisions, air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Ozone<br/>PM10 Particulates<br/>PM2.5 Particulates<br/>Sulphur Dioxide<br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>

currentForecast.forecastSummary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Sunday 13 March to end of Sunday 13 March GMT
currentForecast.forecastText: Windy weather on Sunday should give quick dispersion of locally emitted pollutants. With air arriving initially from rural areas of France and later on the Atlantic, little by way of imported pollution is expected either.<br/><br/>Air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Ozone<br/>PM10 Particulates<br/>PM2.5 Particulates<br/>Sulphur Dioxide<br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>
